description: The scallops need at least three hours to marinate, which gives you plenty of time to get ahead.
keywords: Ceviche,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Low salt,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Soy free,Wheat free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Grapefruit Scallop Ceviche Skewers Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 fresh red chilli, deseeded and finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: If using king scallops, slice in half crossways.
Combine the scallops, zest and juice of grapefruit, juice of lime, oil, chilli, onion, and salt in a non-metallic bowl. Cover and refrigerate for 3 hours, stirring occasionally.

Remove scallops with a slotted spoon. Toss to coat with coriander and spring onion. Thread two queen scallops or two king scallop halves onto each of the 20 wooden skewers or toothpicks. Serve chilled with herbed yoghurt dip.
